show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: Living in “Adam’s World”
content: Charlene Spretnak speaks with Elizabeth Dodson Gray about her new memoir and a lifetime of influential books such... <!--more--> as Patriarchy as a Conceptual Trap (with 59 New Yorker cartoons) and her work in the “gender-Reformation” of Christianity [elizabethdodsongray.com]; poem by Adrienne Rich
